name: iims
description: '''json let users=[     {         'id':1,         "name":ram     } ] ''' |Routes                |        Request method              |         Description       | |------------          |        --------------              |         -----------       | |/user                 |        POST                        |         Create a new user | |/user                 |        GET                         |         Get all users     | |/user/:id             |        PUT/PATCH                   |         Update user by given unique ID | |/user/:id             |        GET                         |         Get user by given unique ID | |/user/:id             |        DELETE                      |         Delete user by given unique ID |
